NYT-R.BK.summary: Namyong Terminal Public Company Limited provides port services in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Seaport and Related Services; and Warehouse Service. It offers roll-on/roll-off (Ro/Ro) terminal services for liners and automobile manufacturers to transport vehicles and general cargo at A5 Terminal, Laem Chabang Port located in the Chonburi. The company also provides parking space for preparing vehicles prior to export or after import; and office and equipment rental services, as well as vehicle cleaning services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 270,027 square meters of warehousing areas; and 1,000 square meters of warehouse. Namyong Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NYT.BK.summary: Namyong Terminal Public Company Limited provides port services in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Seaport and Related Services; and Warehouse Service. It offers roll-on/roll-off (Ro/Ro) terminal services for liners and automobile manufacturers to transport vehicles and general cargo at A5 Terminal, Laem Chabang Port located in the Chonburi. The company also provides parking space for preparing vehicles prior to export or after import; and office and equipment rental services, as well as vehicle cleaning services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 270,027 square meters of warehousing areas; and 1,000 square meters of warehouse. Namyong Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NYVC.F.summary: CH. Karnchang Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand and the Lao People's Democratic Republic. The company offers its services for various projects, including mass rapid transit systems, airports, roads and expressways, energy, water supply and harbors, and buildings projects. It also engages in the sale of construction materials; and rental of construction equipment. The company serves government agencies. CH. Karnchang Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NYVF.F.summary: Italian-Thai Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the civil and infrastructure construction and development businesses in Thailand, India, and internationally. The company undertakes various construction projects, including office buildings, condominiums, skyscrapers, and hotels, as well as industrial plants; and pipeline and utility works, such as oil, gas, and water transmission pipelines, as well as conduit and manhole systems, and storage tanks. It also undertakes highway, railway, high speed rail, runway viaduct, track work, underground and elevated mass transit system, bridge, and expressway projects; airports, ports, and marine works; dams, tunnels, and power plants; and steel structure, telecommunications, and mining projects. In addition, the company offers coal digestion, and foundation and piling work services; manufactures and distributes cement, as well as steel pipes for civil construction; produces and distributes electricity; and holds concession for constructing elevated expressway, as well as deep sea port and railway in Mozambique. Further, it is involved in rock quarrying, processing, and distribution activities; manufacturing, distribution, and installation of concrete panels and products for real estate; production and sale of vessels and equipment; and real estate development activities. Additionally, the company engages in the construction of track doubling project; an airport terminal in India; and underground electrical train station in Taiwan. Italian-Thai Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NYVK.F.long_name: Sino-Thai Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited
NYVK.F.summary: Sino-Thai Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It is involved in the construction of infrastructure development projects, including mass transit transportations, elevated roads, highways, roads, bridges, dams, jetty work, and other projects. The company also constructs industrial projects consisting of factories and chemical plants; building projects comprising office buildings, condominiums, housing projects, resorts, hangers, stadiums, convention centers, museums, hospitals, schools, and airport terminals; and power, gas, and energy projects, as well as environmental projects, such as oil wastewater treatment plants. In addition, it is involved in the construction contracting activities; rental of office buildings, machinery, and construction equipment; provision of document storage services; development of real estate projects; and electricity generation activities. The company was founded in 1962 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NYVQ.F.long_name: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited
NYVQ.F.summary: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited engages in developing, managing, and operating international airports in Thailand. The company operates through Airport Business, Hotel Business, Ground Aviation Services, and Security Business segments. It operates six international airports, including Suvarnabhumi, Don Mueang, Chiang Mai, Hat Yai, Phuket, and Mae Fah Luang Chiang Rai airports. The company is also involved in the hotel and restaurant business; and services or rental of ground equipment, as well as provides security services. Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1903 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NYVS.SG.summary: Precious Shipping Public Company Limited owns and operates dry bulk ships on a tramp-shipping basis worldwide. It is involved in the chartering and technical management of ships. The company primarily handles cement, agricultural products, steel, fertilizers, ore and concentrates, coal, logs, and other item cargoes. As of December 31, 2019, it owned and operated 36 dry bulk ships, including 9 Supramax, 8 Ultramax, and 15 Handysize, including 4 cement carrier vessels with a total capacity of 1,585,805 deadweight tons. Precious Shipping Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NYVU.F.long_name: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited
NYVU.F.summary: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a shipping service company in Thailand and internationally. It operates through four segments: Shipping, Offshore Service, Agrochemical, and Investment. The company offers dry bulk shipping services that carry iron ores, coal, grains, cements, fertilizers, and steel and forest products; ship agency and ship brokerage services; and operates dry bulk vessels for tramp services. It also provides offshore services to the oil and gas industry; and produces and markets NPK compounds, bulk blending products, and fertilizers under the Stork brand for customers' needs for coffee, rice, rubber, vegetables, and various other crops. In addition, the company owns and operates Phu My port in South Vietnam; and provides ship supplies and logistics services, including supply of ship stores, cargo dunnage materials, cargo lashing and securing equipment, cargo handling equipment, tally and checker services, forklift rental/services, and warehouses and storage spaces for rental, as well as material procurement, management, and distribution services. Further, it offers cargo loading and unloading, cargo handling, and transportation services; owns and operates a fleet of nine petroleum tankers/barges and one liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) tanker; transporting fuel, such as petroleum, ethanol, and LPG products to various ports/depots; provides water and coal supply chain management services, as well as pipeline installation and repair services; produces and distributes canned food and fruit beverage; and operates and franchises Pizza Hut and Taco Bell restaurants. Additionally, the company trades in wood pellets and fertilizers; acts as a ship agent; provides property management and drilling services; road transportation services; produces and sells treated water; and engages in the lifestyle and entertainment businesses. The company was founded in 1904 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

OTO-R.BK.short_name: ONE TO ONE CONTACTS PUBLIC COMP
OTO-R.BK.long_name: One to One Contacts Public Company Limited
OTO-R.BK.summary: One to One Contacts Public Company Limited primarily provides customer contact center services in Thailand and Cambodia. The company operates through two segments, Outsourced Contact Center Services and System Maintenance, and Turnkey Total Solutions. It offers tele-survey, tele-sales, follow-up, direct mail, customer care, order taking, complaint handling, technical support/help desk, payment reminders, direct marketing support, campaign management, data entry and data Cleansing, feedback, and marketing management services. The company also provides contact center setup, solution design and integration, software application development, project management, and maintenance services; in-house and on-site rental of information service center and contact center equipment for organizations to enhance business operations; telemarketing management services for financial and insurance services; and training, preparation, and program enhancement services for staff development in various levels for contact center service operations. In addition, it offers outsourced customer service representative services comprising management and recruitment of customer relation staff, including selection, training, monitoring, and quality control to maintain the standard of services; and personnel replacement and staff welfares. Further, the company offers hosted contact center system solutions; and business process, customer service, and marketing and sales outsourcing services, as well as technology innovation solutions. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

PHOL-R.BK.summary: Phol Dhanya Public Company Limited distributes occupational safety, health, and environment products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Trading in Health and Safety Products, Water Treatment System, and Water Supply Systems for Villages. It offers personal protection equipment, including respirator, hand, hearing, face, and hand protection products, as well as firefighting suits, protective cloths, hearing protection, and safety shoes and glasses; and workplace safety equipment, such as system containment systems, emergency showers, portable ventilators, positive respirators, fall protection products, measurement products, leak and spill controls, and lockout tagouts. The company also provides cleanroom products, including swaps, sticky rollers, cleanroom bonds, and wipers; and clean agents and PPE vending machine. In addition, it is involved in the production, distribution, and service of water treatment systems, industrial water treatment systems, and water purifiers; and production and distribution of water in the form of concessions to the government and private sector. Phol Dhanya Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand.

PIMO-R.BK.summary: Pioneer Motor Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacturing and distributing of electric motors in Thailand. It offers air conditioner motors, industrial motors, submersible and centrifugal pumps, and pool and spa pump motors. The company also exports its products to ASEAN countries, as well as to Australia, New Zealand, North America, Europe, and the Middle East. Pioneer Motor Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

PK-R.BK.summary: Patkol Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in and services various engineering products in Thailand and internationally. It offers turnkey sales services in design, manufacturing, and installation of various industrial refrigeration machinery for the ice making, supermarket, dairy and ice-cream processing, and food related processing plants and supplies industries. The company provides ice making machines, ice storage equipment, and ice handling machines; and cold room products, chillers, refrigeration equipment, freezers, and supermarket showcases. It also offers food and dairy machinery, including thermization and pasteurization machinery, UHT units, pouch filers, tubular heat exchangers, clean in place machinery; mixing and blending systems, extraction systems, fermenter systems, dissolving systems, filling systems, heating and cooling systems, and utilities systems, as well as control and automation systems, milk collection centers, and hot water units. In addition, the company provides receiving tanks, storage tanks, milk transport tanks, aseptic storage tanks, mixing tanks, ultra mixers, jacket tanks, fermenter tanks, pharmaceutical grade tanks, fiter vessels, and cooling tanks. Further, it manufactures and imports foam plate and equipment for cold room business; sale of evaporative condensers, share parts, and equipment for evaporative condensers; and designs, manufactures, installs, and maintains pressure and no pressure tanks. The company serves meat processing, frozen food, non-alcoholic, sauce and seasonings, pharmaceutical, chemical, cosmetics, alcoholic drink, and cold storage and distributor industries. The company was formerly known as Patanakolkarn Co., Ltd and changed its name to Patkol Public Company Limited in 1993. Patkol Public Company Limited was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PL-R.BK.summary: Phatra Leasing Public Company Limited provides leasing services primarily to corporate enterprises in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Land Vehicles and Others segments. The company offers various types of vehicles, such as executive cars, business cars, service cars, or trucks, as well as business jets and various types of commercial leasing. It also leases other machinery, computers, and general equipment. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PLE-R.BK.long_name: Power Line Engineering Public Company Limited
PLE-R.BK.summary: Power Line Engineering Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, engineering, and installation of mechanical and electrical systems for private and government sectors in Thailand and internationally. It operates through System Installation and Construction, and Real Estate Development segments. The company is also involved in the installation of telecommunication, air conditioning, sanitary and plumbing, and fire protection systems; and civil construction operations in the areas of super structures, reinforced concrete roads, diaphragm and curtain walls, and tunneling and site drainage facilities. Power Line Engineering Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PORT-R.BK.summary: Sahathai Terminal Public Company Limited engages in the shipping and logistics businesses in Thailand. The company offers coastal port, coastal port arrangement consultancy, tug boat, inland transport, and related merchant marine services. It also provides on-site container inspection, cleaning, maintenance, repair, and upgradation services; multipurpose terminal services, such as bulk and project cargo, and coastal shipping; warehousing services; and value added logistics services inside the port. Sahathai Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 2007 and is based in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

PPM-R.BK.long_name: Porn Prom Metal Public Company Limited
PPM-R.BK.summary: Porn Prom Metal Public Company Limited distributes metal products in Thailand. The company sells copper and brass products; aluminum alloy sheets, foils, and strips; steel and stainless steel wires; aluminum roof sheets; copper tubes, pancake coils, and fittings; insulation products; spiral ducts; and welding consumables and machines. It also manufactures and distributes flexible packaging products; provides services for design, supply, and installation of electricity; assembles and exports solar cells; and sells construction materials. Porn Prom Metal Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PPP-R.BK.summary: Premier Products Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes environmental products, construction materials, and industrial products in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Water Treatment Solution, Environmental Preservation Products, and Clean energy business. The company offers wastewater treatment systems; wastewater equipment; water storage systems; integrated water management systems; air pollution treatment system; and wastewater treatment system monitoring and maintenance services. It also provides environmental preservation products, such as precast lightweight wall panels and building decoration materials, noise barrier systems, chemical corrosion resistant tanks and components; and solar PV systems. In addition, the company produces electricity from solar power. Further, it exports its products. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PPP.BK.summary: Premier Products Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes environmental products, construction materials, and industrial products in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Water Treatment Solution, Environmental Preservation Products, and Clean energy business. The company offers wastewater treatment systems; wastewater equipment; water storage systems; integrated water management systems; air pollution treatment system; and wastewater treatment system monitoring and maintenance services. It also provides environmental preservation products, such as precast lightweight wall panels and building decoration materials, noise barrier systems, chemical corrosion resistant tanks and components; and solar PV systems. In addition, the company produces electricity from solar power. Further, it exports its products. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PPS-R.BK.long_name: Project Planning Service Public Company Limited
PPS-R.BK.summary: Project Planning Service Public Company Limited provides engineering and architectural services for the private and public sectors in Thailand and internationally. The company offers various project management/construction services, such as project planning/scheduling, project feasibility study, financial planning, design management, quantity survey, design review, project budgeting, value engineering, architectural and engineering design, and green and sustainable design. Its project management/construction services also include quantity survey, engineering procurement and construction, construction management and supervision, project cost control, progress report presentation, and contact management; and claim management, facility management, and quality inspection and deliver to site administrator. In addition, the company provides technical services support; BIM objects creation, rendering and animation, construction simulation, and software training; and land management and development, residential property development, facility service management, hospitality management, and construction project management services. Further, it is involved in the repair, maintenance, and installation of power systems, as well as provides computer and media services; provision of services as a consultant for energy efficient buildings, green building, and sustainable building projects; and provision of advisory for investment in information technology system and other investment, as well as services for trading, renting, leasing, exchanging, mortgage, and consignment related to real estate. Project Planning Service Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PREB-R.BK.summary: Pre-Built Public Company Limited engages in the hire construction works in Thailand. It manufactures and sells precast floor products; and develops and sells real estate properties, as well as engages in investment activities. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

PSL-R.BK.summary: Precious Shipping Public Company Limited owns and operates dry bulk ships on a tramp-shipping basis worldwide. It is involved in the chartering and technical management of ships. The company primarily handles cement, agricultural products, steel, fertilizers, ore and concentrates, coal, logs, and other item cargoes. As of December 31, 2019, it owned and operated 36 dry bulk ships, including 9 Supramax, 8 Ultramax, and 15 Handysize, including 4 cement carrier vessels with a total capacity of 1,585,805 deadweight tons. Precious Shipping Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PYLON-R.BK.summary: Pylon Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It offers foundation services, including bored piles, ground improvement, diaphragm walls, and other construction services. The company also engages in the rental of machines, equipment, and tools. Pylon Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Q-CON-R.BK.long_name: Quality Construction Products Public Company Limited
Q-CON-R.BK.summary: Quality Construction Products Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, produces and distributes autoclaved aerated concrete blocks, reinforced wall panels, floor panels, and lintels for construction uses. The company also offers counter structure, plastering mortar, bed adhesive mortar, and tools and accessories. It operates in Thailand, Australia, and internationally. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Ayutthaya, Thailand. Quality Construction Products Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of SCG Building Materials Company Limited.

QLT-R.BK.summary: Qualitech Public Company Limited provides technical services testing, and inspection and certification services for operation safety of industry equipment, pressure vessel, industrial boiler, piping, and steel structures in Thailand and internationally. Its services include non-destructive tests; inspection and certification; asset integrity and plant inspection; metallurgical testing laboratory; welding; and tank cleaning services. It serves oil and gas, metal manufacture/importer, fabrication and construction, power generation, and tank and terminal industries. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

QTC-R.BK.summary: QTC Energy Public Company Limited manufactures and sells electric transformers in Thailand and internationally. The company offers hermetically sealed oil type distribution, on load tap changer, amorphous metal distribution, dry type class F and H, pad mounted, earthing, CSP-type, gas sealed, DE bus duct, dry type cast resin, and power transformers, as well as open type transformers with conservators. It also provides various services, such as scheduled checks and maintenance, transformer repairs and maintenance, transformer oil fill services, transformer rental services, etc. In addition, the company invests in renewable energy business; and produces and distributes electricity from solar energy. It offers its products under the QTC name, as well as under customer specific brands. The company was formerly known as QTC Transformers Co., Ltd. and changed its name to QTC Energy Public Company Limited in August 2010. QTC Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

RCI-R.BK.summary: The Royal Ceramic Industry Public Company Limited manufactures, imports, and distributes ceramic floor and wall tiles in Thailand. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. The Royal Ceramic Industry Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Dynasty Ceramic Public Company Limited.

RCL-R.BK.long_name: Regional Container Lines Public Company Limited
RCL-R.BK.summary: Regional Container Lines Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, owns, operates, and manages ships in North East Asia, South East Asia, Indian Sub-Continent, and the Middle East. The company owns and operates 44 container vessels. It also provides logistics, cargo consolidation and operation, shipping agency, and transportation and cargo handling services. In addition, the company operates terminals; and rents warehouse facilities. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

RP-R.BK.long_name: Raja Ferry Port Public Company Limited
RP-R.BK.summary: Raja Ferry Port Public Company Limited provides ferry services for passenger and transportation primarily in Thailand. It owns and operates a fleet of 13 ferries covering 3 routes between Donsak-Koh Samui-Donsak, Donsak-Koh Phangan-Donsak, and Koh Samui-Koh Phangan-Koh Samui. The company also engages in the provision of wharf services; and trades in wharf and in passenger ferryboat. In addition, it provides shipping services, such as shipping of fresh fruits and vegetables, as well as gas and oil products for private sector. Raja Ferry Port Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Surat Thani, Thailand.

RT-R.BK.summary: Right Tunnelling Public Company Limited engages in the construction of geotechnical works and general civil works, and dams. It is also involved in the structural concrete works. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Samutprakan, Thailand.

SABUY-R.BK.summary: Sabuy Technology Public Company Limited provides top-up service for prepaid phone and electronical receipt through top-up machines in Thailand. Its top up machines offer mobile top up, bill payment, money transfer, and insurance payment. The company also sells food and beverage through vending machines; provides food court management services; and offers financial services. Sabuy Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 2016 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCI-R.BK.summary: SCI Electric Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of electrical switch boards and galvanized steel structures to various public/private sector projects. It operates through three segments: Manufacture of Switch Board, Manufacture and Galvanized Service, and Services and Others. The Manufacturer of Switch Board segment offers low and medium voltage electrical switch boards, cable trays, support systems, and related equipment. The Manufacture and Galvanized Service segment provides transmission line and telecommunication towers, as well as galvanizing steel structures; sells wiring equipment; and offers hot dip galvanized services. The Services and Others segment offers project management services under the engineering, procurementm and construction contract; and distributes and sells electricity produced from the hydroelectric power plant. SCI Electric Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bang Bo, Thailand.

SE-R.BK.summary: SiamEast Solutions Public Company Limited distributes and provides services related to industrial equipment. The company offers centrifugal pumps for utility systems and industrial production processes; positive displacement pumps for high viscosity fluids; other equipment used in liquid ring gas compressor and centrifugal gas compressor; and energy efficiency measurement of pump systems, as well as engineering services for pumps. It also provides production process equipment, including strainers, filters, decanter centrifuges, mist eliminators, desiccants, ceramic catalyst bed support product, equipment to exchange materials, thermal and combustion units, air pollution treatment units, plastic pipes, plastic lined galvanized steel pipes, fire hoses, plastic tanks, breather valves, pressure relief valves, pressure relief plates, flameless explosion venting devices, isolation valves, and explosion suppression. In addition, the company offers adhesive products comprising cyanoacrylate glues, anaerobic adhesives, thread sealings, retainings, liquid gaskets, gasket sheet and spiral wound gaskets, and epoxy glues; sealant materials consisting of silicone and acrylic sealants, and polyurethane grouts; coating materials, such as coating and rust treatment products; and occupational health and safety products, including industrial cleaning paper products, machine tool removers, hand cleansers, gasket removers, safety glasses, safety gloves, body protection suits, fire blankets, chemical protection guards, heat resistant glass products, insulation products, pipe repairing kits, and cutting and grinding discs. Further, it provides surface coating services for machinery and equipment; design and sewing services for insulating covering machinery and equipment; demolition, assembly, installation, and testing services; and other services for the installation of a new pump. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

SEAFCO-R.BK.summary: Seafco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the contractual construction of foundation and general public works in Thailand and internationally. It offers bored piling services, such as small and large diameter bored piling, auger drilling for bored piles, and drilling with bucket under slurries; rectangular, L shape, and T shape barrette piling services; and diaphragm walling services for deep basements, underpass tunnels, MRTA subway stations, and cut and cover tunnels. The company also undertakes substructure works, including foundation pile and diaphragm wall construction, temporary bracing installation, excavation, and construction of foundation mat and basement slabs. In addition, it engages in the civil construction of turnkey projects comprising underpass tunnels, fish marketplaces, and sports stadiums; and ground improvement works, such as soil improvement, deep mixing, and jet grouting for embankment foundations of highways, canals, river banks, tunnel openings, etc., as well as provision of vertical drain installation services. Further, the company offers ancillary services, including as sonic integrity test, drilling monitoring, pile load testing, and inclinometer monitoring, as well as rental services for movable and immovable assets. Seafco Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SFT-R.BK.summary: Shrinkflex (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes shrink sleeve label printing manufacturing systems in Thailand. The company offers high definition printing systems, which include gravure and digital printing systems. It also provides shrink and stretch films; and consulting services. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Chachoengsao, Thailand.

SMIT-R.BK.summary: Sahamit Machinery Public Company Limited imports and distributes materials, machinery, and appliances for industries in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Steel & Heat Treatment, Machine Tools & Tooling, and Others. It provides special steels for making molds, including hot work tool steel for aluminum extrusion and die-casting; cold work tool steel for blanking and punching tools, shear blades, automobiles, and electronic appliances; high speed steel for end mill cutters, twist drills, and wood-working tools; and plastic mold steel for PVC pipes, melamine kitchenware, and screw parts in the plastic injection machines. The company also offers CNC EDM, wire cutting, high speed machining center, and measuring machines; and machinery, including carbide cutting tools, digital readouts, measuring equipment, milling machines, surface grinding machines, and automatic band sawing machines, as well as spare parts. In addition, it provides pulp and paper products, machinery, accessories, forming fabric felts, canvass, refiner plates, chemicals, etc. for pulp and paper industry; and offers paper converting services. Further, the company distributes a range of electrotechnical products and services, including electrical measuring instruments, medium voltage automation and protection products, and low voltage switchgear, as well as offers electrical engineering services; and aluminum alloys. Additionally, it provides wood processing machinery and equipment, as well as heat treatment services; and chipper, flaker, circular, and straight knives. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SMPC-R.BK.long_name: Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited
SMPC-R.BK.summary: Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited manufactures and sells LPG and other pressure cylinders in Thailand and internationally. It offers LPG cylinders; automotive LPG cylinders; methyl bromide cylinders, refrigerant cylinders, lubricant cylinders, and specialty gas cylinders; and parts and components, such as spuds, valves, valve caps, collar/handles, and footrings. The company also provides container repairs and quality testing services; general body reconditioning services for damaged cylinders; paint coating services for cylinders; and valve replacement services. Its cylinders are used in household, recreational, industrial, energy, and automobile sectors. The company sells its products under SMPC name. Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SO-R.BK.summary: Siamrajathanee Public Company Limited provides various outsourcing services to public and private sectors in Thailand. The company offers personnel management services, including drivers, office workers, technicians, and forklift drivers, as well as Academy, a professional driver training course; Drive4U, a private chauffeur service; and training services. It also offers car rental services; Mr.Journey, a shuttle van for wheelchair users; data recording and scanning services; landscape management; and tree care services. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.

It operates through three segments: Freight Forwarder, Land Transportation, and Others. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SQ-R.BK.summary: Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited provides overburden and lignite removal services in Thailand and the Lao People's Democratic Republic. The company offers construction, overburden, and coal removal services; and soil and coal extraction and removal services for the Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand. It also rents machinery; and offers mining consulting services. Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SRICHA-R.BK.summary: Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited engages in construction business, machinery and equipment rental, and consulting on architectural and engineering in Thailand and internationally. The company provides construction services in the areas of mechanical, welding, equipment and vessels, ducts, steel fabrication, shutdown, piping, turbine and generator, tanks, structural steel, pipe rack and buildings, piping work and installation, civil construction, permanent and temporary facilities, as well as sandblasting, grit blasting, and painting services. It also offers manpower supply agency services; and a range of maintenance services for power and petrochemical plants, oil refineries, industrial plants, etc., as well as rents construction equipment and tools. The company was formerly known as Sriracha Construction (1994) Co. Ltd and changed its name to Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited in December 2011. Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Si Racha, Thailand.

STARK-R.BK.summary: Stark Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the electric wire and cable business in Thailand and internationally. It manufactures, trades in, and provides service test for wire products made from copper and aluminum, which are used in electrical transition, telecommunications, and construction applications. The company's products include bare electric, medium voltage electric, high and extra high voltage electric, and low voltage electric wires; electric wires for general building; telephone line; and fire resistant and flame restardant cables. It also offers manpower services; and services, such as vessel cleaning, off shore construction services, fabrication and maintenance services, etc. related to petroleum business, as well as rents properties. The company was formerly known as Siam Inter Multimedia Public Company Limited and changed its name to Stark Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2019. Stark Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

STEC-R.BK.summary: Sino-Thai Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It is involved in the construction of infrastructure development projects, including mass transit transportations, elevated roads, highways, roads, bridges, dams, jetty work, and other projects. The company also constructs industrial projects consisting of factories and chemical plants; building projects comprising office buildings, condominiums, housing projects, resorts, hangers, stadiums, convention centers, museums, hospitals, schools, and airport terminals; and power, gas, and energy projects, as well as environmental projects, such as oil wastewater treatment plants. In addition, it is involved in the construction contracting activities; rental of office buildings, machinery, and construction equipment; provision of document storage services; development of real estate projects; and electricity generation activities. The company was founded in 1962 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

STI-R.BK.summary: Stonehenge Inter Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides consulting and construction management services in Thailand. It also offers architectural and engineering design services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

STPI-R.BK.summary: STP&I Public Company Limited engages in the steel fabrication works, and manufacture of boilers and pressure vessels in Thailand, Japan, Sri Lanka, and internationally. The company offers steel structures for airports, exhibition halls, and high-rise buildings; industrial plants, such as factories, automobile plants, and steel mills; power plants, including boiler structures and turbine buildings, as well as for equipment support structures; petrochemical plants consisting of refineries, and gas separation and aromatic plants; and bridges comprising built-in cable anchor structural decks, main structures, decking for cable stay bridges, flyovers, and pipe bridges jetties. It also provides piping pre-fabrication and erection services for various industrial plants, including power plants, oil refineries, petrochemical plants, offshore process plants, etc., as well as produces offshore and onshore modules. In addition, the company offers engineering services in the design of steel-to-steel connection, as well as shop and erection drawing services. Further, it provides fabrication services, such as cutting/rolling/drilling, assembly and welding, inspection, blasting and painting, and packing and delivery; and plant and module construction, as well as construction support services. Additionally, the company manufactures, sells, and rents construction equipment; offers property development and logistics services; produces and distributes electricity generated from waste; and engages in the municipal solid waste management activities, as well as rents land, office buildings, and warehouses. It also sells oil through its community automated gas station. The company was formerly known as Sino-Thai Pressure Vessel & Iron Works and changed its name to STP&I Public Company Limited in 1995. STP&I Public Company Limited was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SUC-R.BK.summary: Saha-Union Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, invests in textiles, plastic, rubber and metal, trading, energy, real estate, and hotel businesses in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Textile; Plastic, Rubber and Metal; Trading; Energy; Hotel; and Investment and Others segments. It is involved in the contract manufacture and distribution of textile products and garments, including sewing accessories, such as zippers, threads, and buttons; cotton, polyester cotton, and/or other synthetic fiber for preparing workwear and fabric used in other industries; fashion clothing and workwear; and clean room garments. The company also manufactures and distributes rubber, elastic products, plastic products, vacuum bottles, and stainless steel kitchenware; manufactures and repairs molds; and operates as a distributor and dealer of components of infrastructure for data center, operating systems, virtual environment, application software, security control, computer and accessories, etc. In addition, it generates electricity through cogeneration power plants; operates the Hilton Hua Hin Resort and Spa, a five star hotel comprising 296 rooms in Hua Hin Town, as well as rubber estates; and provides dormitory rental and services. Further, the company invests in chemical and hospital business. Saha-Union Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SYNTEC.BK.summary: Syntec Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate development and construction activities in Thailand. The company undertakes residential, commercial, institutional, leisure, retail, industrial, and infrastructure projects. It is also involved in the real estate development for apartment service and rental; management of hotels, service apartments, and other properties; and procurement and installation of sanitation systems, electrical systems, and communications and air systems, as well as provision of consulting services. The company was formerly known as Siam Syntech Construction Public Company Limited and changed its name to Syntec Construction Public Company Limited in April 2004. Syntec Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

T-R.BK.long_name: T Engineering Corporation Public Company Limited
T-R.BK.summary: T Engineering Corporation Public Company Limited engages in plant and building construction, and other related activities in Thailand. The company constructs industrial factories, steel-structure constructions, warehouses, condominiums, office buildings, shopping malls, hospitals, and petrochemical constructions. It also provides civil engineering services, such as civil works, reinforced concrete-structure works, steel-structure works, and architectural works, as well as installation of engineering systems, including electric, energy management, telecommunication, air conditioning, sanitation, and fire prevention systems. The company was formerly known as Thai Industrial and Engineering Service Public Company Limited and changed its name to T Engineering Corporation Public Company Limited in May 2017. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TAKUNI-R.BK.summary: Takuni Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It operates through Liquid Petroleum Gas Trading; Gas Installation Equipment Trading; Transportation Services; Construction Services; Non-Destructive Testing and Inspection Services; and Others segments. The company offers petroleum gas trading for household cooking, industrial, and transportation sectors. It also provides industrial and car gas systems installation and equipment trading services. In addition, the company offers hazardous substances and construction materials transportation services by land; non-destructive testing and certify services under safety standards and regulations inspection services; and property development services. Further, it is involved in the industrial oil and gas piping system construction activities. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TAPAC-R.BK.summary: Tapaco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic and assembly parts for electrical and electronic products in Thailand, Sweden, and internationally. The company offers engineering plastic parts comprising semi-finished drive units, fax cover frames, fax bases, multi-function office equipment, and wireless handset bodies for fax machines; black-and-white and color photosensitive drums, laser printing machines, parts of laser printers, inkjet printers, mobile printers, etc. for printing and photocopying machines; tape driving and holding parts, CD grips, turn tables, etc. for car audio equipment; and other plastic parts that are used to manufacture household electrical appliances, such as refrigerators, air conditioners, auto parts, etc. It also manufactures plastic injection molds; and provides repair, maintenance, and modification services for plastic injection molds. In addition, the company is involved in the residential construction; investment, development, and sale of real estate properties; and cosmetic retailing business. Tapaco Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

TAWNF.long_name: Thai Airways International Public Company Limited
TAWNF.summary: Thai Airways International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the operation of airline business. It operates through three segments: Air Transportation Activities, Business Units, and Other Activities. The Air Transportation Activities segment provides composed of passenger, freight, and mail services. The Business Units segments offers cargo and mail commercial, ground customer, ground handling and equipment, and catering services. The Other Activities segment is involved in the transportation supporting activities, which include dispatch services, sales on board, THAI shop, and technical services. The company is also involved in the provision of aviation training services; tourism business; and information technology for travel services. As of December 31, 2019, it had a route network servicing to 62 destinations in 31 countries with 3 domestic destinations; and a fleet of 103 aircraft, including 32 owned aircraft, 32 aircraft under finance leases, and 39 aircraft under operating leases. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TBSP-R.BK.summary: TBSP Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells security documents in Thailand and internationally. It prints annual reports, coupons, gift cards, share certificates, commercial cash coupons, postal stamps, postcards, passbooks, cheques and cheque books, continuous forms, brochures, one-part mailer, payroll slips, and other commercial documents; and debit and credit cards, membership cards, gift cards, contact cards, contactless cards, dual-interface cards, employee and student ID cards, transportation cards, biometric cards, plastic and paper prepaid cards, and display cards. The company also offers information, document, and security management solutions; smart office platform; smart label products, such as track and trace solution, a data tracking system to manage and track the delivery process of the supply chain; product inspection and authentication system; and other products in the field of smart factory, Internet of Things, and augmented reality. In addition, it provides document solutions management services, such as document management, forms, printing consultancy and design, manufacturing, purchasing, quality control, database storing, product delivery, destroying important documents, and list making, as well as services related to stationaries and other equipment; and service for individual data printing and mailing such as statements, advertising letters, insurance policies, bills, invoices, etc. The company was formerly known as Thai British Security Printing Public Company Limited and changed its name to TBSP Public Company Limited in June 2019. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand. As of April 4, 2018, TBSP Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of T.K.S. Technologies Public Company Limited.

TCJ-R.BK.summary: T.C.J. Asia Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and distributes machinery and lifting equipment for construction work, and loading and unloading services in Thailand and internationally. It provides tractors, wheel loaders, excavator, and cranes. The company also manufactures and distributes stainless steel pipes, as well as trades in stainless steel products. In addition, it is involved in the rental and repair of cranes and trucks; and installation works. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TEAMG-R.BK.long_name: TEAM Consulting Engineering and Management Public Company Limited
TEAMG-R.BK.summary: TEAM Consulting Engineering and Management Public Company Limited provides integrated engineering, environment, and management consultancy services in Thailand and internationally. It also prepares environmental impact assessment reports. The company offers planning, design, study, and construction supervision and management services for mass transportation systems, railways, motorways, roads and rural highways, bridges and crossings, airports, harbors, mass transportation systems, and traffic engineering and logistics management. It also provides services related to basin-wide water resource management and development, irrigation, flood control and drainage, hydropower, coastal engineering, and water supply. In addition, the company offers services, including research, planning, designing, project management, construction supervision, operation, and maintenance for building and infrastructure projects; and services related to environmental studies for various projects, such as water resource development, transportation systems, building and infrastructure, and clean energy, as well as wastewater, solid waste, and hazardous waste management projects. Further, it provides services related to power system development, oil and gas industry, fossil-fuel and renewable energy technology, energy conservation, and clean energy. Additionally, the company offers consulting services; strategic management, finance and investment, accounting, marketing, project management, and project development services; and energy engineering comprising energy conservation, energy utilization, energy management system, energy measurement, energy utilization inspection, and analysis for government and private sectors, as well as plans and designs building architecture, interior design, and landscape architecture. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THE-R.BK.summary: The Steel Public Company Limited engages in selling and transforming steel products in Thailand. It offers hot and cold rolled coils and sheets, electro galvanized steel coils and sheets, and hot dip galvanized steel coils and sheets; and light lip channel steel products, square and rectangular steel pipes, carbon steel pipes, hot rolled steel sheets and plates, checkered plates, angle steel bars, channel steel bars, galvanized steel pipes, square and flat bars, and cold round bars. The company also provides structural steel products, including H-beams, I-beams, wide flanges, and steel sheet piles; and steel bars, such as round and deformed steel bars. In addition, it produces and processes hot rolled steel into various products comprising slitting coils, steel pipes, and C-channels; and offers logistic services. The company was formerly known as Thai Yuan Metal Public Company Limited and changed its name to The Steel Public Company Limited in July 2014. The Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THMUI-R.BK.long_name: Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited
THMUI-R.BK.summary: Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of wire rope products and lifting equipment in Thailand. The company operates through Sales and Service; and Project Work segments. It offers single layer or single strand, and rotation resistant or multi strand wire ropes; flat and round webbing slings; steel chain slings; and lifting equipment, such as thimbles, wire rope clamps/clips, shackles, chain blocks, level blocks or level hoists, electric chain hoists, and masterlinks, as well as HDPE pipes, electric motors, hooks, and light bulbs. The company also provides services that include inspection service on wire rope tensile strength and replacement services; visual inspection service of the crane and wire rope; non-destructive testing; and installation, repair, consultancy and training services. The company was formerly known as Thai Mui Trading Corporation Co., Ltd. Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TIGER-R.BK.summary: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in construction and interior service business. It is also involved in the business of aluminum installation and sale of construction material. Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is based in Bang Kruai, Thailand.

TKS-R.BK.summary: T.K.S. Technologies Public Company Limited manufactures and sells continuous paper forms, securities printing products, and other printing and continuous labels primarily in Thailand and internationally. The company's products include digital print and mail forms, cheque on demand forms, warehouse management forms, advance forms, business forms, office papers, and flexible packaging products. It is also involved in the provision of information technology and software consultancy services; investment activities; and laser printing and enveloping of statements, bills, and invoices. In addition, the company offers printing warehouse services. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TMC-R.BK.summary: T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes hydraulic machinery and handling equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Manufacture and Distribution of Machinery; Services; and Project Construction Service. The company offers hydraulic presses, including hydraulic clapper die spotting, hydraulic die spotting, hydraulic try out, hydraulic deep drawing, hydraulic hemming, hydraulic molding for hot, hydraulic trimming and bending, and hydraulic special presses, as well as provides automation machines for interior material. It also provides material handling equipment, such as hydraulic hand pallet trucks, table lifts, drum carrier trucks, X-lifts, stackers, hydraulic lift elevators, and dock levelers; and motorcycle lifters and full rise scissor lifts. In addition, the company offers automatic parking lifts, such as two post parking, two post tilt parking, scissor ranking, four post parking, four post double wide, three floors valet vertical parking level parking, three level parking, pit design parking, and rotatory parking lifts. Further, it provides mobile cranes, such as knuckle and telescoping boom cranes, and container lifts; hydraulic static pile drivers; presses mechanical and hydraulic isgec; special materials; and hydraulic cylinders and power units; and home elevators. Additionally, the company offers machine repair and maintenance, and metal machining services. T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

TMI-R.BK.summary: Teera-Mongkol Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electrical equipment in Thailand. The company offers a range of ballasts for fluorescent lamps, compact fluorescent lamps, and HID lamps for electronic and magnetic types; and control gear products, such as ignitors, photo switches, change over switches, and transformers for halogen lamps. It also generates and sells electricity. In addition, the company exports its products. Teera-Mongkol Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TNDT-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nondestructive Testing Public Company Limited
TNDT-R.BK.summary: Thai Nondestructive Testing Public Company Limited, a technical service company, provides nondestructive engineering services in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Nondestructive Testing Services, and Inspection Services for Pressure Vessel and Others. The company offers a range of conventional inspection services, including ultrasonic, radiography, eddy current, magnetic particle, liquid penetrant, positive material identification, and visual services. It also provides advance nondestructive testing technology and inspection techniques, such as above ground storage tank program, pipeline radiography, small controlled area radiography, remote visual inspection, positive material identification, and liquid pressure test packs. In addition, the company engages in the rendering excavation and transportation services of coal for the coal mine concessionaire; generation and sale of electricity from coal-fired thermal power; and procurement and servicing of public utility systems and other related businesses, as well as offers advisory services for engineering. Further, it provides engineering inspection and nondestructive testing of pressure vessels, heat exchangers, boilers, piping, and structures in the fields of oil refinery, power plant, petrochemical plant, ship building, offshore, bridge and building construction, and other various heavy industries. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It undertakes construction of building, commercial building, power plant, infrastructure, hospital, and residential building projects. The company also engages in the property development activities; trading business; and production and trading of electricity. In addition, it invests in energy business. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRC-R.BK.summary: TRC Construction Public Company Limited provides construction services in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Pipeline System Construction, Engineering System, Civil Work Construction, and Sales and Other Services. It primarily provides engineering design, procurement, construction, and construction management services. The company also engages in pipeline system construction, engineering system installation, and factory construction in energy and petrochemical industries, as well as project development and investment business in real estate, power plant, and petrochemical sectors. In addition, it constructs roads, water systems, bridge, wastewater treatment system, dam, water distribution system, and railway, water supply, and airport facilities, as well as other infrastructure; underground electrical conduits, including boring and pipe jacking work; and produces and distributes tap water. TRC Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRITN-R.BK.summary: Triton Holding Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction and engineering business in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Constructions Business, and Electricity and Energy Business. It constructs non-residential buildings; and provides land and building rental services. The company also engages in the mining and construction material supply; electricity generation from solar, wind, hydro, biogas, and waste; waste management; sale of radio taps and radio compact discs; and alternative energy resource and mining businesses. In addition, it is involved in provision of directional drilling contract business, which performs works of oil, water, sewer, and gas pipelines, as well as fiber optic cables; management of real estate; film production and distribution; showcasing; radio business; and production of TV programs for pay TV businesses. The company was formerly known as Live Incorporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Triton Holding Public Company Limited in October 2015. Triton Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRT-R.BK.summary: Tirathai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, repairs, sells, and maintains transformer equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company offers power transformers for manufacturers and suppliers of electrical energy. It also provides various distribution transformers comprising freely breathing system, completely filled, gas cushion, inert gas pressure system, loop feed or radial feed, and power unit load center transformers. In addition, the company offers special transformers, such as rectifier transformers, which are used in chemical industrial factories; induction furnace transformers that are used in metals smelting industry; and transformers using other insulators, such as silicone oil, etc. Further, it provides transformer tank body and accessories, including covers, fins, clamps, etc.; and distributes, installs, and maintains electrical power equipment. Additionally, the company offers transformer erection and installation, oil filling, maintenance, modification and repair, testing, and equipment rental services; and custom metalwork services. Tirathai Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

TTA-R.BK.long_name: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited
TTA-R.BK.summary: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a shipping service company in Thailand and internationally. It operates through four segments: Shipping, Offshore Service, Agrochemical, and Investment. The company offers dry bulk shipping services that carry iron ores, coal, grains, cements, fertilizers, and steel and forest products; ship agency and ship brokerage services; and operates dry bulk vessels for tramp services. It also provides offshore services to the oil and gas industry; and produces and markets NPK compounds, bulk blending products, and fertilizers under the Stork brand for customers' needs for coffee, rice, rubber, vegetables, and various other crops. In addition, the company owns and operates Phu My port in South Vietnam; and provides ship supplies and logistics services, including supply of ship stores, cargo dunnage materials, cargo lashing and securing equipment, cargo handling equipment, tally and checker services, forklift rental/services, and warehouses and storage spaces for rental, as well as material procurement, management, and distribution services. Further, it offers cargo loading and unloading, cargo handling, and transportation services; owns and operates a fleet of nine petroleum tankers/barges and one liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) tanker; transporting fuel, such as petroleum, ethanol, and LPG products to various ports/depots; provides water and coal supply chain management services, as well as pipeline installation and repair services; produces and distributes canned food and fruit beverage; and operates and franchises Pizza Hut and Taco Bell restaurants. Additionally, the company trades in wood pellets and fertilizers; acts as a ship agent; provides property management and drilling services; road transportation services; produces and sells treated water; and engages in the lifestyle and entertainment businesses. The company was founded in 1904 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TTCL-R.BK.summary: TTCL Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, procures, and constructs integrated industrial factories in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Energy Business and Construction Business. It offers engineering design services for civil structures and utility systems, such as electricity, water, air conditioning, solid and wastewater treatment systems, storage tanks, production processes, and petrochemical and chemical plants, as well as procurement of machinery and equipment, and plant construction. The company also generates and sells electricity to the government through gas-fired power plants and solar power plants, as well as invests and develops renewable energy power plants and invests in energy business. In addition, TTCL Public Company Limited offers conceptual study, pre-feasibility study, and detailed feasibility study services. The company was formerly known as Toyo-Thai Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to TTCL Public Company Limited in April 2015. TTCL Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UEC-R.BK.summary: Unimit Engineering Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, shop fabrication, field installation, and erection of steel products and construction works in Thailand and internationally. It offers pressure vessels, including cryogenic/ISO tanks, columns/towers, shell and tube heat exchangers, spherical tanks, and vessels/drums, as well as LPG tanks comprising LPG aboveground and underground tanks, and transport/wagon tanks; and machinery parts, such as fan casings/pre heaters, water treatment parts, furnace casings, diverters, stacks/chimneys, and other products. The company also provides storage tanks, including API storage tanks and silo/hopper products; steel structures, piping shop fabrication products, and platforms/ladders; and mechanical installation services, such as piping and equipment installations, module works, and shut down/modification work services. Unimit Engineering Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Phrapradaeng, Thailand.

UMI-R.BK.long_name: The Union Mosaic Industry Public Company Limited
UMI-R.BK.summary: The Union Mosaic Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes floor and wall tiles in Thailand and internationally. It operates through two segments, Import Floor Tiles and Wall Tiles, Export Floor Tiles and Wall Tiles. The company's products include floor, wall, mosaic, and porcelain tiles. It is also involved in the sale of mineral and soil, real estate, and ceramic agent activities. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UNIQ-R.BK.long_name: Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited
UNIQ-R.BK.summary: Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction contracting and real estate development businesses in Thailand. Its projects include steel bridges, reinforced concrete bridges, tunnel beneath the intersections, concrete-surfaced or asphaltic concrete roads, public utility works, structural works, building works, dam and retaining walls, etc. The company also leases service machinery; manufactures construction materials; sells sand; produces concrete ready mix and precast concrete; and offers steel fabrication, assembly and survey, and repair and maintenance services for machinery and equipment. In addition, it is involved in the service of infrastructure and systems. The company primarily serves government agencies. Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

UREKA-R.BK.summary: Eureka Design Public Company Limited designs, manufactures, and sells machinery for the automotive and other industries in Thailand, India, and internationally. It operates in five segments: Design Manufacture and Installation of Semi - Automatic Machine; Design Manufacture and Installation of Automatic Machine; Installation and Maintenance of Machine; Manufacture of Pesticides and Agrochemical Products; and Others. The company offers industrial machines, such as washing, test, tightening, press, assembly, measuring, machining, and marking machines; agricultural machines; and leak test, Skysaver, vacuum lifter, and food machines. It also provides part feeders, auto load equipment, collaborative robots, and industrial robots; stacker cranes, carriers, and shuttles; chillers; robotics for logistics; and CCTV products. In addition, the company is involved in the retail business; sale of equipment and tools; design, production, and sale of machining jigs and parts; manufacture and sale of pesticides and agrochemical products, and water; production of raw water; and manufacture and sale of energy. Eureka Design Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

VL-R.BK.summary: V.L. Enterprise Public Company Limited engages in a tanker fleet business and provides logistical cargo shipping in Thailand and internationally. It transports petroleum and chemical products through vessels for local trading area and near coastal trading area. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WGE-R.BK.long_name: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited
WGE-R.BK.summary: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited provides commercial and residential construction services. It also offers after sales service, including warranties and claims, providing technical advice and maintenance to its customer. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

WGE.BK.long_name: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited
WGE.BK.summary: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited provides commercial and residential construction services. It also offers after sales service, including warranties and claims, providing technical advice and maintenance to its customer. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

WICE-R.BK.summary: Wice Logistics Public Company Limited provides air and sea freight forwarding, customs brokerage, inland transportation, cross-border and multimodal transportation, warehousing, and various freight related services for imports and exports in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Sea Freight, Air Freight, Cross Border Service, and Logistics segments. The company transports sea freight, including full container load and less than container load services for various forwarders and containers; and offers air freight services. It also provides customs clearance services, including duty intensive consultation; internal transportation services using trailer and dump trucks, lorries, or minivans from pick up point to the port; and warehouse storage services, such as multi user and dedicated warehouses, and warehouse management. The company was formerly known as Wice Freight Services (Thailand) Company Limited and changed its name to Wice Logistics Public Company Limited in April 2015. Wice Logistics Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WIIK-R.BK.summary: WIIK Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes high density polyethylene (HDPE) pipes and related fittings, low density polyethylene pipes, polypropylene pipes, polybutylene pipes, and weholite spiro pipes in Thailand. The company offers polyethylene pipes for potable water and water supply systems, transmission lines, distribution systems, drainages, sewage and storm water systems, and conduits primarily for use in governmental and private sectors; structured wall HDPE pipes that are used in municipal, industrial, road construction, rehabilitation, and marine pipeline applications; and HDPE tanks for water storage. It also provides HDPE pipe welding and installation services; and consultancy, advisory, and servicing of HDPE pipe installation. In addition, the company engages in the water management and distribution business, as well as designs, constructs, and operates water supply systems. Further, it operates tap water production business with ultra-filtration and reverse osmosis systems. The company was formerly known as Wiik & Hoeglund Public Company Limited and changed its name to WIIK Public Company Limited in December 2019. WIIK Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
